data.title: bd-35ed: implement 'botbox protocol start' command
data.description:
Implement the botbox protocol start read-only guidance command that checks bead state and outputs shell commands for starting work.

The implementation:
- Uses ProtocolContext to gather claims and workspace state
- Implements state analysis: ready (unclaimed), blocked (claimed/closed), resumable (held claim)
- Generates 7-step shell workflow: stake claim → create workspace → stake workspace claim → update status → comment → announce
- Supports all output formats (text/json/pretty) via render module
- Implements --dispatched flag to omit bus announcement for worker dispatch
- Shell-escapes bead titles safely
- Validates all outputs before rendering

Test coverage: ready status path, claim conflicts, closed beads, nonexistent beads, resumable state, format handling, --dispatched behavior, shell escaping with special characters.
